items.sentence: I can assure you everything has been taken care of.
Tom made me swear that I\'d never to do that again.
I want a complete list of everything Tom purchased.
You shouldn\'t have put yourself in that situation.
We used to have airplanes, but we had to sell them.
We waited all afternoon for Tom, but he never came.
I want to apologize for the way I acted last night.
There was a half-eaten apple near the kitchen sink.
There was absolutely nothing you could do about it.
There were only a few days left before the wedding.
